description: Simple calculator - Cleanroom learning example with basic operations
systemDescription: Scientific calculator library providing basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) and advanced functions (trigonometric, logarithmic, exponential, power). Handles floating-point arithmetic with proper rounding. Includes error handling for division by zero, domain errors (sqrt of negative), and overflow/underflow. Maintains calculation history. Designed as a reusable library component for multiple applications.
notes: Good introductory example for learning Cleanroom methodology
Small scope makes formal specifications manageable
Clear mathematical basis for correctness verification
Usage model straightforward - operation frequency distribution
Floating-point arithmetic provides interesting verification challenge
Can demonstrate Cleanroom benefits even on small systems
Moderate reliability target appropriate for library component
Proof of correctness optional for learning example
Increments: (1) basic ops, (2) advanced math, (3) error handling, (4) history
